EmailTemplate.subject: Wishing you a very Happy Birthday {!Contact.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
On your special day, we wanted to take a moment to appreciate all your hard work, dedication, and positive energy that you bring to our team. You make a difference every day, and we are grateful to have you as a part of our team. So, let's put work aside for a while and enjoy your birthday with some crazy dance moves, laughter, and endless joy.
Happy birthday from all of us at Cloud Peritus. May this year be filled with success, happiness, and new opportunities.
Regards,
The Cloud Peritus Team
